subject: Re: [junit] Beginner : Who can tell me how to use TestSetup.class in junit?
msgSnippet: ... Please Google JUnit FAQ . The short answer is this: a TestSetup invokes setUp before invoking a test suite, then tearDown after all the tests have
messageBody:
nearycn wrote:

> I want to know how to use the class (TestSetup.class) and where it
> will be used?

Please Google "JUnit FAQ".

The short answer is this: a TestSetup invokes setUp before invoking a
test suite, then tearDown after all the tests have executed.
--
J. B. Rainsberger,
Diaspar Software Services
